kw.name: Close All Connections
kw.doc: Closes all open connections and empties the connection cache.

kw.name: Load Topology
kw.doc: Load the topology YAML file.

kw.name: Get Device Info
kw.doc: Get device information from the loaded topology.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Connect To Dut
kw.msg: recv b'\r\nWarning: Telnet is not a secure protocol, and it'
recv b' is recommended to use Stelnet.'

Warning: Telnet is not a secure protocol, and it is recommended to use Stelnet.
>>User name:

recv b'


 Huawei Integrated Access Software (MA5800)'
recv b'.\r\n Copyright(C) Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. 20'
recv b'------------\r\n User last login information:\r\n --'
recv b' Access Type IP-Address Time '
recv b' password is set by other administrator or NMS, it'

recv b' is 
recommended to change the password.\x00

MA58'
kw.doc: Connect to device using topology information.

kw.name: Unset Interactive
kw.msg: recv b' Interactive function is disabled\r\n\r\nMA5800-X7>'
kw.doc: keyword using for huawei only, it should perform with each test

kw.name: Send Command
kw.doc: Send command and optionally reset prompt.

kw.name: Send Command
kw.doc: Send command and optionally reset prompt.

kw.name: Send Command
kw.doc: Send command and optionally reset prompt.

kw.name: Get Onuid From Serial
kw.msg: recv b' Command is being executed. Please wait\r\n'
recv b'he total of ONTs are: 7, online: 1\r\n ------------'
recv b'\r\n ONT SN Type Distance Rx'

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Catenate
kw.doc: Catenates the given items together and returns the resulted string.

kw.name: Create Table
kw.doc: Keyword: Create Table Nhận đầu vào là chuỗi định dạng bảng (pipe separated) hoặc đã là DataFrame. Nếu là chuỗi thì chuyển đổi nó thành pandas DataFrame. Example: ${RAW_OUTPUT} SEPARATOR=${EMPTY} ... | Interface | TYPE | STATUS | MODE | FLOWCTRL |

kw.name: Get Onu Uni Info
kw.msg: send b'display ont port state 6 7 eth-port all\r\n'
display ont port state 6 7 eth-port all
recv b'T Speed(Mbps) Duplex LinkState RingStat'
${onu_uni_info} = -------------------------------------------------------------------------- ONT-ID ONT ONT Speed(Mbps) Duplex LinkState RingStatus port-ID Port-type ---------...

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Parse Table
kw.msg: Return: ONT_ID PORT_ID PORT_TYPE SPEED DUPLEX LINK_STATE RING_STATUS 0 7 1 10GE 1000 full up -
${onu_uni_table} = ONT_ID PORT_ID PORT_TYPE SPEED DUPLEX LINK_STATE RING_STATUS 0 7 1 10GE 1000 full up -
kw.doc: Keyword: Parse Table Use TextFSM to parse the raw_string into a DataFrame. Arguments: - raw_string: output string need to be parsed. - template_path: path to file TextFSM template. File extension: *.template

kw.name: Verify Table
kw.msg: Arguments: [ ONU_ID PORT_ID LINK_STATE 0 7 1 up | ONT_ID PORT_ID PORT_TYPE SPEED DUPLEX LINK_STATE RING_STATUS 0 7 1 10GE 1000 full up - ]
kw.doc: Keyword: Verify Table Compare two tables (expected_result and actual_result) based on the specified mode. Input can be a string or a DataFrame. - If whitelist: all rows in the expected_result must appear in the actual_result. - If blacklist: no rows in the expected_result should appear in the actual_result.

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Set State Onu Uni Down
kw.msg: send b'ont port attribute 6 7 eth 1 operational-state off\r\n'
ont port attribute 6 7 eth 1 operational-state off [1D

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Catenate
kw.doc: Catenates the given items together and returns the resulted string.

kw.name: Parse Table
kw.msg: Return: ONT_ID PORT_ID PORT_TYPE SPEED DUPLEX LINK_STATE RING_STATUS 0 7 1 10GE - - down -
${onu_uni_table} = ONT_ID PORT_ID PORT_TYPE SPEED DUPLEX LINK_STATE RING_STATUS 0 7 1 10GE - - down -
kw.doc: Keyword: Parse Table Use TextFSM to parse the raw_string into a DataFrame. Arguments: - raw_string: output string need to be parsed. - template_path: path to file TextFSM template. File extension: *.template

kw.name: Verify Table
kw.msg: Arguments: [ ONU_ID PORT_ID LINK_STATE 0 7 1 down | ONT_ID PORT_ID PORT_TYPE SPEED DUPLEX LINK_STATE RING_STATUS 0 7 1 10GE - - down - ]
kw.doc: Keyword: Verify Table Compare two tables (expected_result and actual_result) based on the specified mode. Input can be a string or a DataFrame. - If whitelist: all rows in the expected_result must appear in the actual_result. - If blacklist: no rows in the expected_result should appear in the actual_result.

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.
